Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Arc Smelter^reset; to ^green;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
Fantastic work! Truly amazing. As promised, your reward: ^orange;lots of money^reset;

There is an expensive but ^green;very powerful^reset; piece of technology called an ^orange;arc smelter^reset; which will increase smelting yields a great deal. Prove you can ^orange;build one^reset; with your ^orange;Power Station^reset; and I'll toss you a bonus.
